targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    sum(bytes_sent) / (($__toTime) - ($__fromTime)) AS bytes_per_second
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host      LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'

SELECT
  count() / dateDiff('second', $__fromTime, $__toTime) AS avg_requests_per_second
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host      LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'

SELECT
   toString(status) AS status,
  count()                       AS request_count
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host       LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip  LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY status
ORDER BY request_count DESC

SELECT $__timeInterval(ts) as "time", count(ts) FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip like '%${IP}%'
  GROUP BY time

SELECT
  method                        AS method,
  count()                       AS request_count
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host       LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip  LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY method
ORDER BY request_count DESC

SELECT
  quantile(0.95)(duration_ms) AS current_p95_response_time_ms
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ts BETWEEN $__fromTime AND $__toTime
  AND status   != '101'
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(ts)                          AS "time",
  quantile(0.95)(duration_ms)                  AS p95_response_time_ms
FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND status   != '101'
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  quantile(0.80)(duration_ms) AS current_p95_response_time_ms
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ts BETWEEN $__fromTime AND $__toTime
  AND status   != '101'
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'

SELECT
  quantile(0.5)(duration_ms) AS current_median_response_time_ms
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ts BETWEEN $__fromTime AND $__toTime
  AND status   != '101'
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'

SELECT
    host as Application,
    count()                AS requests
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip like '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Application
ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT
    host                            AS Application,
    uniqExact(remote_ip)            AS unique_ip_count
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Application
ORDER BY unique_ip_count DESC

SELECT
    host                            AS Application,
    sum(duration_ms)/1000                AS total_duration_seconds
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND status != '101'
  AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Application
ORDER BY total_duration_seconds DESC

SELECT
    host                            AS Application,
    sum(bytes_sent)                AS total_duration_seconds
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND status != '101'
  AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Application
ORDER BY total_duration_seconds DESC

SELECT
    host                                       AS Application,
    round(countIf(status >= 500) / count() * 100, 2) AS failure_rate_percent
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Application
ORDER BY failure_rate_percent DESC

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(ts)             AS "time",
  uniqExact(remote_ip)            AS unique_ip_count
FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(ts)             AS "time",
  sum(duration_ms)           AS total_duration_ms
FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(ts) AS time,
    sum(bytes_sent) / $__interval_s AS bytes_per_second
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ts)
    AND host LIKE '%${Application}%'
    AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY
    time
ORDER BY
    time ASC

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(ts)             AS "time",
  countIf(status >= 500)          AS failure_count
FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    concat(host, splitByChar('?', uri)[1])   AS Path,
    count()                                       AS requests
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Path
ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT
    concat(host, splitByChar('?', uri)[1])   AS Path,
    avg(duration_ms)                               AS avg_response_time_ms
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
  AND status != '101'
GROUP BY Path
ORDER BY avg_response_time_ms DESC

SELECT remote_ip, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY remote_ip
ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT
    concat(host, splitByChar('?', uri)[1])   AS Path,
    count()                                       AS requests
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
  AND status >= 500
GROUP BY Path
ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT
    concat(host, splitByChar('?', uri)[1])   AS Path,
    round(countIf(status >= 500) / count() * 100, 2) AS failure_rate_percent
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY Path
ORDER BY failure_rate_percent DESC

SELECT
    sum(bytes_sent)
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
LIMIT 200

SELECT
  remote_ip,
  sum(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent
FROM "logs"."caddy_requests"
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host      LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
GROUP BY remote_ip
ORDER BY total_bytes_sent DESC;

SELECT
    ts, remote_ip, method, host, uri, status, bytes_sent, duration_ms	
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host     LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip LIKE '%${IP}%'
ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 200

WITH first_seen AS (
  SELECT
    remote_ip,
    min(ts) AS first_seen
FROM logs.caddy_requests
WHERE ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime )
  AND host       LIKE '%${Application}%'
  AND remote_ip  LIKE '%${IP}%'
  GROUP BY remote_ip
),
new_ips_per_bucket AS (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(first_seen) AS bucket,   -- 
    count() AS new_ips
  FROM first_seen
  GROUP BY bucket
)
SELECT
  bucket AS time,
  sum(new_ips) OVER (ORDER BY bucket ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS cumulative_unique_ips
FROM new_ips_per_bucket
ORDER BY bucket;
